36 Layout(components::component_state_t* _root_state, components::component_base_t* _root)
37 : root_state(_root_state), root(_root), focused(_root_state) {
38 focused->focused = true;
39 }
40
41 bool render_if_dirty(components::component_base_t* c);

48
49 template<components::ComponentConcept C>
50 friend Layout* cydui::layout::create(C &&root_component);
51
52 public:
53 ~Layout() {
54 for (auto &item: listeners) {
55 item->remove();
56 delete item;
57 }
58 }
59
60 //drag_n_drop::dragging_context_t dragging_context {};
61
62 void bind_window(window::CWindow* _win);
63 };
64}
65
66template<cydui::components::ComponentConcept C>
67cydui::layout::Layout* cydui::layout::create(C &&root_component) {
68 auto* root_state = new typename C::state_t();
69 auto* root = new C {root_component};
70 root->state = root_state;
71 auto* lay = new Layout(root_state, root);
72 return lay;
73}
